entry.source: {F812}Shopkeeper\0{F813,0,405406}Alright, bring 'em out already and{F801}I'll appraise them for you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Shopkeeper\0This is the best I can give you for{F801}those. Take it.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Shopkeeper\0This is the best I can give you for{F801}those. Take it.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Shopkeeper\0{F813,4,405402}Make sure you bring more Macca next{F801}time.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Shopkeeper\0{F813,4,405402}Make sure you bring more Macca next{F801}time.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Shopkeeper\0{F872,1} x{F878,1}, huh?{F801}{F878,2} Macca's a fair price,{F801}right?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Shopkeeper\0{F813,0,405404}You better not just be window shopping.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Shopkeeper\0{F813,0,405404}You better not just be window shopping.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Shopkeeper\0{F813,0,405401}...You had to come now, didn't you?{F801}
